data.title: Where to Stay in Izmir, Turkey
data.meta_description: Where to stay in Izmir, Turkey - look no further as these are the best places to stay in Izmir (plus best areas and for all budgets).
data.text:
When deciding where to stay in Izmir, Turkey the possibilities are endless. From cheap backpacker digs to posh, luxurious hotels, there is a Izmir accommodation for every type of traveler and for every type of budget.

Izmir is a coastal city that can be found on Turkey‚Äôs west coast in the Aegean Region. There are lots of things to do in Izmir and day trips to take that a visit to this coastal city should not be missed when traveling around Turkey.

Behind Istanbul and Ankara, Izmir is Turkey‚Äôs third largest city in terms of population. The city has a fascinating history and is one of the oldest cities in the Mediterranean world.

In this article, we‚Äôll go over the best hotels in Izmir, the best area to stay based on your travel preferences and list housing options for every type of budget.

For full transparency, I have sprinkled some affiliate links in this post which gives me a small commission at no extra cost to you if you decided to make a purchase. As always, I would never recommend a product or service that I didn't truely believe in. If you find this post useful, you can also treat Jess to a cup coffee by clicking the icon on the bottom of the page. This will allow me to continue to create more content for you to enjoy ‚òïÔ∏è.

But first, are you in a hurry? If you are trying to book a room tonight or don‚Äôt have time to read the whole article, below I listed a quick list of the best places to stay in Izmir for easy booking.

Table of Contents

Toggle

Where to Stay in Izmir, Turkey Quick List

Where to stay in Izmir on a budget ‚Äì Piano Hotel

Best place to stay in Izmir for couples ‚Äì Radisson Hotel Izmir Aliaga

Where to stay in Izmir for luxury on the waterfront ‚Äì Izmir Marriott Hotel

Where to stay in Izmir for the solo adventurist ‚Äì Lotus Garden Hostel Izmir

Keep scrolling for more details of the best places to stay in Izmir, Turkey.

Best Area to Stay in Izmir

There are only a few areas in Izmir that most travelers stay ‚Äì Konak, Alsancak, Gaziemir and Balcova.

Konak often referred to as the the Izmir City Center, is the best area to stay in Izmir for tourists as it‚Äôs close to all the Izmir tourist attractions including the waterfront and the public transportation system. This area includes the active, colorful and vibrant Kemeralti Shopping District.

This area showcases the local culture yet still caters to the needs of tourists. You can‚Äôt beat the location and you‚Äôll find hotels for every type of budget.

Alsancak is the downtown district that borders the historic city center. Staying here puts you in the entertainment district close to restaurants, bars and public transportation.

Gaziemir is where to stay in Izmir if you want to have quick and easy access to the airport. This area also gives you straightforward access to the freeway and the rails. There are a number a mid range budget hotels in the Gaziemir neighborhood.

Balcova is a bit farther away from the Konak or the Alsancak neighborhoods. This area is home to both luxurious and cheaper hotels. This area is famous for its thermal baths and the Balcova cable car.

Cheap Hotels in Izmir

Piano Hotel

View Property ‚Üí

The Piano Hotel is a cheap hotel located in the heart of the Konak district in Izmir. If you like to be in the middle of the action and be able to walk to most places then staying at the Piano Hotel is a great option.

Rooms are simply decorated but have all the basic amenities you could want ‚Äì Wifi, hot shower with good water pressure, maid service, mini fridge and even a view of the chaotic street below. Better yet splurge a few extra dollars and you can get a room with a balcony.

Breakfast is included in the price of the room and is exceptional. An array of fresh olives, various cheeses and ripe tomatoes are a few of the items you‚Äôll be able to start your day with.

Lotus Garden Hostel Izmir

View Property ‚Üí

Located in the heart of Izmir, the Lotus Garden Hostel Izmir is a great place to stay in Izmir on a budget. For more privacy book a private 3 person room or if you are flying solo opt for a bed in the 8 or 6 bed mixed dormitory.

The eco hostel serves up a delicious organic breakfast every morning for 30 TL extra and each room is equipped with air conditioning, wifi, hot water and large windows for natural light.

The highlight of staying here is the cozy common area. There‚Äôs a fireplace, outdoor patio full of plants that make you feel like your in an oasis in the city. Plus there‚Äôs a shared kitchen which helps save a few bucks on eating out. This is the best place to stay in Izmir for the solo adventurist.

Vakana House Hostel

View Property ‚Üí

Another great place to stay in Izmir on a budget is the Vakana House Hostel. Located in the heart of the Alsanca neighborhood, you‚Äôll be surrounded by art, history, cute cafes and nightlife.

The hostel was once a mansion and has been renovated & restored to its original Greek House facade. It even has the antique furniture which only adds to its charm.

You can rent a bed in a small mixed bed dormitory or pay a little more for a private room. This is a place suitable for any type of traveler, whether you‚Äôre traveling with your partner, on a solo adventure or working remotely, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Tanik Hotel

View Property ‚Üí

Centrally located, the Tanik Hotel is a modern hotel that provides all your basic amenities. Such amenities include air conditioning, coffee maker, electric kettle, TV and free breakfast.

The rooms are cozy, showers are pleasant and beds are comfortable. This place to stay in Izmir provides great value for your money especially if you are traveling as a couple.

Mid Range Hotels in Izmir

Emens Hotel

View Property ‚Üí

Located just down and across the street from the Piano Hotel, Emens Hotel is set in prime central location to explore all there is to do in Izmir. This modern mid range hotel has all the basic amenities you would need including an electric kettle and even Netflix on TV.

Once you step foot outside this Izmir hotel, you‚Äôll hit the ground running. Close to all types of different shops and restaurants, Emens Hotel is walking distance to the pier, bazaar, Konak square and the iconic Izmir clock tower.

This is where to stay in Izmir for a wonderful breakfast, modern facilities and all the action at your fingertips.

Radisson Hotel Izmir Aliaga

View Property ‚Üí

Radisson Hotel Izmir Aliaga is a mid range Izmir hotel set in a quiet location. The cozy design is modern and new. The comfortable rooms make sleeping a breeze.

Booking a stay at the Radisson Izmir comes with free continental breakfast and city views. Some other perks include a fitness center, free parking, spa along with a restaurant and bar on site. This hotel offers great value for your money on a mid range budget.

Orty Airport Hotel

View Property ‚Üí

The Orty Airport Hotel is a great option of where to stay in Izmir if you are flying into the city, are renting your own car and plan on doing a few day trips in the area. The hotel features a modern interior decorated with wood furniture and warm colors.

All rooms are big, comfortable and come with free breakfast. One of the best features of staying at this Izmir hotel is the free shuttle to the airport. This makes a comfortable place to stay if you have an early flight out.

There is a convenient a car service rental available on property as well as an ATM which will only make your travels easier. Stay here for the proximity of the Izmir airport and price.

Hakcan Hotel

View Property ‚Üí

The Hakcan Hotel has everything you need for a great trip to Izmir. It‚Äôs clean, comfortable and offers great value for your money. Located in close proximity for shopping, restaurants, public transportation and the airport.

If you don‚Äôt mind working the metro you‚Äôll be able to check all the awesome things to do in Izmir without a problem. A great breakfast buffet is served every morning and you‚Äôll be impressed with the spread.

Where to Stay in Izmir for Luxury

Izmir Marriott Hotel

View Property ‚Üí

Situated in a prime location in the center of ƒ∞zmir, the Izmir Marriott Hotel offers 5 star accommodations on the waterfront. The best part is you can get top notch service and amenities at only a fraction of the price compared to its Western Europe or USA counterparts.

Staying here comes with its share of perks. Enjoy an outdoor swimming pool, huge shared lounge, terrace, bar and restaurant on site. The restaurant is exceptional and serves Mediterranean, Turkish and local cuisine.

After a few days of sightseeing Ephesus or exploring the Pergamon Ruins, plan a day of pampering at the spa. Here you can enjoy top of the line spa services, a sauna and also a hot tub. Plus you have access to the indoor pool and fitness center if you‚Äôre like me and love to stay in shape on the road.

Swiss√¥tel Buyuk Efes

View Property ‚Üí

Overlooking the Aegean Sea, the Swiss√¥tel Buyuk Efes is one of the best places to stay in Izmir if you are looking for a bit of luxury. Wake up to the sensational views of the Bay of Izmir as you sip your coffee and plan your adventures for the day.

Set aside a morning for health and beauty treatments at the P√ºrovel Spa after you have a good sweat session in the top notch fitness center or tennis courts. The Equinox rooftop restaurant serves up tasty cuisine and offers a romantic setting if you are traveling with a partner.

All rooms are equipped with air conditioning, free breakfast and a balcony just to name a few of the perks. Located in the Alsancak district, stay here for romantic vibes and epic views.

Hyatt Regency Izmir IstinyePark

View Property ‚Üí

Hyatt Regency Izmir IstinyePark is a fabulous Izmir hotel complete with a spa. Other awesome luxuries to enjoy with a stay here is an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness center and a restaurant on location.

Situated above the Gulf of Izmir, most rooms come with a balcony and each room has ocean views which only makes waking up that much easier. Located at the intersection of the city‚Äôs best connections hub, staying at the Hyatt Regency allows you to experience all of the city‚Äôs major attractions.

This is a great hotel in Izmir to book if you are traveling to the city for a special occasion such as a wedding as its one of the best venues in the city. Stay here for location, amenities and excellent service.

Wyndham Grand ƒ∞zmir √ñzdilek

View Property ‚Üí

‚≠êÔ∏è A top pick of where to stay in Izmir, Turkey.

If you are looking of where to stay in Izmir for relaxing, amenities and luxury then look no further than the Wyndham Grand ƒ∞zmir √ñzdilek. Located on the shore of ƒ∞zmir Bay, you‚Äôll get views of the sea, nature and city. It‚Äôs the best of both worlds.

If you stay here, you must take advantage of the decadent spa. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, indoor swimming pool, children‚Äôs pool, hammam and thermal pools ‚Äì basically all the pools you could want.

Let‚Äôs not forget the saunas and fitness center. I mean did you even visit Turkey if you don‚Äôt try a traditional Turkish bath?

Hay Hotel Alsancak

View Property ‚Üí

Another wonderful place to stay in Izmir is the Hay Hotel Alsancak. You can‚Äôt beat the location, close to the seaside, the ferry, the railway station and close to many bars and restaurants.

Rooms at this boutique hotel are modern and are equipped with a TV, minibar, an electric kettle, a bidet, desk and safety deposit box. Plus there‚Äôs room service you‚Äôll be blown away by the continental breakfast served up every morning. Stay here to be in the entertainment district and near the metro which has direct connection to the airport.
